cards.name: Defend

cards.name: Buckler Bash

Lose 5 (7) Block.
If you do, deal 12 (18) damage.

cards.name: Cutting Words
cards.description: Apply 1 (2) Weak and 1 (2) Vulnerable to a random enemy for each [DebuffNote] you have bard:Queued.

cards.name: Echo Echo
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
Deal 3 (5) damage.

cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block.
If the enemy is Vulnerable, gain 6 (8) Temporary_HP instead.

Gain 11 (14) Block.
bard:Queue a bard:Rest.

cards.name: Gamble

Choose a card type (Attack/Skill/Power).
Draw 1 card, if it is the chosen type, it costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Hideous Laughter
cards.description: Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable and 1 (2) Weak.

cards.description:
Gain bard:Inspiration 50 (75)
for each [BuffNote] you have bard:Queued.

cards.name: Lingering Echo
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
The next card you play this turn remains in your hand.

cards.name: Parry
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Dexterity affects this card 3 (5) times.

cards.name: Phantasmal Force
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) Temporary_HP.
If the enemy is Weak, deal damage equal to your Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Quick Song
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Discard a card.
bard:Queue bard:Notes as if the card was played.

cards.name: Sift
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Gain [E] equal
to its cost. (Draw 1 card.)

cards.name: Song Bolt
cards.description:
Deal 3 (5) damage for each bard:Note you have bard:Queued.
Clear your Note Queue.

cards.name: Studied Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Deals 1 (2) additional damage for each
stack of Weak or Vulnerable on the enemy.

cards.name: Thunderwave
cards.description: Deal 4 (7) damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Tiny Hut
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
Draw 1 card for each unique bard:Note you have bard:Queued.

cards.name: Vicious Mockery
cards.description:
Deal 3 (5) damage.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: 6/4 Time
cards.description: You can bard:Queue 2 additional bard:Notes.

cards.name: 8/4 Time
cards.description: You can bard:Queue 4 additional bard:Notes.

cards.name: Accelerando
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Gain [E].
Draw 2 cards.
Lose [E] next turn.

cards.name: Aphasia
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose between 1 (2) and 3 (4) Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Balestra
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage 3 (4) times.
This card's damage is affected by Dexterity in addition to Strength.

cards.name: Bestow Curse
cards.description:
Enemy loses 4 (7) HP at the start of each of its turns.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Blink
cards.description: Take 50% less damage for 1 (2) turn (turns).

cards.name: Demoralize
cards.description: Double the enemy's Weak and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Dervish Dance
cards.description: Deal 7 (9) damage to ALL enemies for each [AttackNote] you have bard:Queued.

cards.name: Discordant Voice
cards.description: Whenever you bard:Queue a [AttackNote] or [DebuffNote] , deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Doot
cards.description: Choose a bard:Note to bard:Queue.

cards.name: Doot Doot
cards.description: Choose 2 bard:Notes to bard:Queue.

cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Deal 7 damage.
bard:Inspiration affects this card 2 (3) times.

cards.description: Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: False Life

Gain 10 Temporary_HP.
Gain 2 (3) additional Temporary_HP for each [BlockNote] you have bard:Queued.

cards.name: First Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.

cards.name: Flourish
cards.description:
Choose a bard:Note to bard:Queue.
Deal 10 (13) damage.

cards.name: Glyph of Warding
cards.description: Whenever you lose Block or Temporary_HP, deal 2 (4) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Greater Magic Weapon
cards.description:
(Innate.)
The first Attack card you play each turn also applies 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Greatness
cards.description: Gain bard:Inspiration 75 (100).

cards.name: Guard Point
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) Block.
If you have no [BlockNote] bard:Queued, gain 7 (9) Block again.

cards.name: Harmonious Voice
cards.description: Whenever you bard:Queue a [BlockNote] or [BuffNote] , gain 1 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Heroism
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Temporary_HP.
Gain bard:Inspiration 50.

cards.name: Life Drain
cards.description:
Deal 8 (12) damage.
Gain Temporary_HP for half the unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Lingering Performance
cards.description:
All bard:Inspiration you currently have affect 1 additional card.
Exhaustive 2 (3).

cards.name: Locate Object
cards.description:
Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.
bard:Queue a bard:Rest.
Exhaust (Exhaustive 2).

cards.name: Mantle of Inspiration
cards.description: Increase all bard:Inspiration you gain from cards by 25 (50).

cards.name: Off-Key
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Deal 6 (9) damage.
bard:Queue 2 bard:Rests.

cards.name: Prismatic Spray
cards.description:
Add X random Attacks of any color into your hand. They cost 0 this turn (combat).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rest
cards.description:
bard:Queue 2 bard:Rests.
Heal 2 (3) HP for each bard:Rest in your Note Queue.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shout
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Enemy loses 2 Strength.
Decrease this card's Strength loss by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Silence
cards.description:
Enemy cannot  (buff itself or ) debuff you for 3 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solo
cards.description: If your Note Queue contains no bard:Notes, perform any bard:Melody.

cards.name: Thick of the Fight
cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage to a random enemy for each living enemy.
Costs 1 less [E]
for each living enemy.

cards.name: Bottled Song
cards.description:
Obtain a potion containing the bard:Notes currently in your Note Queue.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Covetous Aura
cards.description: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, you also gain the same Strength.

cards.name: Death Metal
cards.description:
You can no longer bard:Queue bard:Notes.
Whenever you would bard:Queue a bard:Note, deal 2 (3) damage to ALL enemies instead.

cards.name: Encore
cards.description: Your next  (2 ) bard:Melody (Melodies) is (are) performed twice.

cards.name: Finger of Death
cards.description: Deal damage equal to twice your Temporary_HP ( to ALL enemies).

cards.name: Focused
cards.description: Gain bard:Inspiration X00. (Refund 1.)

cards.name: Greater Invisibility
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Draw 2 more cards next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Haste
cards.description:
Double your Dexterity.
Exhaust (Exhaustive 3).

cards.name: Improv
cards.description:
This turn, for every 6 (5) bard:Notes you bard:Queue, perform any bard:Melody regardless of your Note Queue.
At the end of this turn, clear your Note Queue.

cards.name: Invisibility
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Draw 1 more card next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magnum Opus
cards.description:
Gain bard:Inspiration 25.
Permanently increase this card's bard:Inspiration by 25.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mnemonic Vestments
cards.description:
Unplayable.  (Ethereal.)
Startup: Choose any card in your deck and shuffle a copy of that card into your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Power Word Stun
cards.description: If the enemy has less than 50 (70) % HP, Stun it for 1 turn.

cards.name: Reverse Gravity
cards.description:
Deal 15 (18) damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
Next turn, deal 15 (18) damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies again.

cards.name: Rhapsody
cards.description:
( Choose a bard:Note to bard:Queue. )
Perform any bard:Melody you have the bard:Notes for, regardless of their order.

cards.name: Shifting
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage or
gain 12 (16) Block.
Deal 12 (16) damage or
gain 12 (16) Block.

cards.name: Sonata
cards.description:
(Innate.)
You can perform every possible bard:Melody in your Note Queue at once.

cards.name: Splendid Form
cards.description:
At the start of
your turn, gain
bard:Inspiration 100 (200).

cards.name: Wish
cards.description: Unplayable (Choose any non-rare Bard card). Ethereal (Permanently replace this card with the chosen card). (Purge.)

relics.name: Bag Pipes
relics.description: Each card you play may also bard:Queue bard:Notes. The bard:Notes bard:Queued depend on the type of the card played and are shown in the card's tooltips.

relics.name: Pitch Pipe
relics.description: At the start of each combat, bard:Queue a [BuffNote].

relics.name: Oil Painting
relics.flavorText: This painting depicts a group of people standing on a stage together. They feel oddly familiar to you.

relics.name: Strange Harp
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Weak or Vulnerable it has to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Every note played on this harp sounds eerie.

relics.name: Coral Orchestra
relics.description: Every 5th bard:Melody you perform is performed twice.

relics.name: Echo Chamber
relics.description: At the start of each combat, perform the last bard:Melody performed in the previous combat.

relics.name: Magic Tuning Fork
relics.description: At the start of your turn, bard:Queue a [WildNote].
relics.flavorText: A memento of your past life. Rings with the sound of a constantly changing note.

relics.name: Deep Vero
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Clear your Note Queue at the end of each turn.

relics.name: Self-Playing Flute
relics.description:
Replaces Pitch Pipe.
At the start of each combat, bard:Queue 2 [WildNote].
relics.flavorText: A magical flute, enchanted to play songs on its own.

relics.name: Conductor's Baton
relics.description: Your Note Queue can hold 2 additional bard:Notes.
relics.flavorText: Beatings will continue until the music improves.

keywords.name: Bard:inspiration
keywords.description: Inspiration increases the damage and Block of the next card played by a percentage. Stacks additively.

keywords.name: Bard:melodies
keywords.description: Sequences of Notes. Performing one gives you beneficial effects.

keywords.name: Bard:queue
keywords.description: Queueing a Note puts it at the end of your Note Queue. If your Note Queue is full, the leftmost Note is removed to make room.

keywords.name: Bard:rest
keywords.description: Rests ( [RestNote] ) can be Queued like Notes but do not count as Notes for other effects.

mods.name: Bard
mods.credits: Testing: Reina, Gremious, Blank The Evil, and Skyson
mods.description: Adds a new playable character: The Bard.
